context:
Rearrange the code blocks to complete a recursive fonction ``fact(n)`` that return the factorial of `n`.
The factorial of an integer has the following formula:

.. code-block::

    n!=n×(n−1)!

Misconception:
  - RecursiveFunctionNeedsIfElse: A recursive function needs to contain an if-else statement.

choices.fail_msg: An else statement is not needed for that function.
